channelPermission.description: Change privacy settings and customize how members can interact with this channel.

channelSlowMode.title: Slowmode Cooldown
channelSlowMode.description: Members will be restricted to sending one message and creating one thread per this interval, unless they have Mange Channel or Manage Messages permissions.

channelHideInactivity.title: Hide After Inactivity
channelHideInactivity.description: New threads will not show in the channel list after being inactive for the specified duration
